name: Abdul-Wahhab Yousuf
story: Abdul-Basir Ahmed-Jan was born and raised in Iran. He joined the military at a young age and was quickly recognized for his skill in missile operation. His dedication and loyalty to the OPFOR faction have earned him a promotion to the rank of Private and an assignment as an Assistant Missile Specialist (AT). Abdul-Basir is reserved and disciplined, always maintaining focus on his mission and his duty to protect his comrades. He is a family man who deeply loves his wife and children but never lets his emotions get in the way of his duty.
